label: 袴
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: Men wore two pair of wide-legged ankle-length trousers (an inner one, and an outer ue no hakama) with full civil dress, and a different sort of under-trousers under gathered trousers (sashinuki) in less formal costume.  Women wore long trousers (nagabakama), with legs that extended well beyond their feet.[上の袴][指貫][長袴][RK]
